isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: HOLSET SS 296 AND QE 296/338 - MAINTENANCE - QE COMPRESSOR

svcproc.title: QE COMPRESSOR
svcproc.para: There are three Maintenance Kits and four Service Kits for the QE single cylinder compressors as follows:

item.para: Unloader Maintenance Kit ( Figure 9). The inlet connection body and unloader body are not included in this kit; they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in this kit, liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap, unloader vee seal and unloader body cavity. Insert grooved side of unloader vee seal into unloader body cavity first.

Valve Body Maintenance Kit ( Figure 10). The head bolts, cover plate, head, exhaust valve retainer and valve body are not included in this kit; they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in the kit, liberally to the unloader cap, unloader vee seal and unloader body cavity.

Component Maintenance Kit ( Figure 11). The head bolts, cover plate, head, exhaust valve retainer, valve body, inlet connection body, unloader cap, unloader body and unloader bolts are not included in this kit; they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in this kit, liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap, unloader vee seal and unloader body cavity. Insert grooved side of unloader vee seal into unloader body cavity first.

Component Service Kit ( Figure 12). The head bolts, cover plate, head, exhaust valve retainer, valve body and unloader bolts are not included in this kit; they are to be reused, unless damaged. Apply Teflon grease, supplied in this kit, liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap, unloader vee seal and unloader body cavity. Insert grooved side of vee seal into unloader body cavity first.
Valve Body Service Kit ( Figure 13). All parts are pre-assembled in the valve body, except the top cover gasket, head gasket, valve body gasket and air intake gasket.

Unloader Service Kit ( Figure 14). Apply Teflon grease liberally to the unloader body O-ring and especially to the unloader cap, unloader vee seal and unloader body cavity. Insert grooved side of vee seal into unloader body cavity first.

Head Service Kits ( Figure 15and Figure 16). All parts are pre-assembled in the valve body and head, except the air intake gasket. These two kits are identical except for the coolant port threads on the head.

note.para: The inlet connection body included makes this particular kit appropriate for QE compressors on Cummins L10, M11 and N14 engines.
